DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact acute blueberry polyphenol intake endothelial function healthy volunteer . Specifically , investigator plan perform randomised , double blind , cross-over human intervention trial use blueberry drink investigate dose-dependent effect blueberry polyphenols blood vessel function use Flow mediate dilation ( FMD ) measure endothelial function . The study measure acute effect flavonoid ingestion vascular reactivity also assess plasma polyphenol metabolite level .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-dependent Effects Blueberry Polyphenols Endothelial Function Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Male 1840 year Healthy sign consent form Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Had suffer myocardial infarction stroke Suffers bloodclotting disorder Suffers metabolic disorder ( e.g . diabetes endocrine liver disease ) Any dietary restriction weight reduce diet Allergies intolerance food Smoker Heavy drinker ( > 21 unit per week ) On lipidmodifying medication On blood pressure lower medication On medication affect blood clot Taking high dose fish oil supplement ( great 1 g EPA DHA per day ) high dos antioxidant vitamin ( great 800 μg vitamin A , 60 mg vitamin C , 10 mg vitamin E 400 μg beta carotene ) Taking probiotic , prebiotics , synbiotics , antibiotic antiinflammatory blood lower medication within 2month period prior study Planning alter consumption vitamin supplements/fish oil capsule course study Undertakes strenuous exercise > 4 time per week > 1 hour per session Haemoglobin level reference range provide Royal Berkshire Hospital
